Body.Content:
Introduction

We’re updating how feedback policies are managed for in-app surveys in Microsoft Teams. Teams for Android and iOS will stop using Teams-specific feedback policies and instead adopt the Microsoft 365 Cloud Policy service. This change aligns survey feedback with other in-app feedback experiences, simplifying policy management across your organization.

When this will happen:

General Availability (Worldwide): Rollout began late October 2025 and is expected to complete by late November 2025.

How this affects your organization:

Who is affected:

  • All organizations using Microsoft Teams for Android and iOS.

What will happen:

  • Teams-specific feedback policies will be retired for surveys.
  • Surveys will now use the same Microsoft 365 Cloud Policy that governs other in-app feedback experiences (such as Give a compliment or Report a problem).
  • The feature will be ON by default.
  • There is no change to how users submit feedback; only policy management is unified.
  • Existing Teams feedback policies will no longer apply after rollout.
What you can do to prepare:

  • No admin action is required before rollout.
  • Review your current Teams feedback policies.
  • Update Microsoft 365 Cloud feedback policies to reflect your organization’s needs.
  • Notify admins and helpdesk staff about this change.
  • Update internal documentation if you reference Teams feedback policies.

Helpful resources:

  • Manage feedback policies in Microsoft Teams
  • Learn about Microsoft feedback for your organization
  • Cloud Feedback Policy Service
  • Overview of Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365
Compliance considerations:

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.

Details.Value: Microsoft Teams for Android and iOS will switch from Teams-specific to Microsoft 365 Cloud Policy for in-app survey feedback management by late November 2025. This unifies policy management with other feedback types, requires no admin action before rollout, and keeps the feature on by default.

Title: Microsoft Teams: In-app survey feedback policies will be managed by default with Microsoft 365 Cloud Policy
